title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: September 02, 2022, 11:02:57 AMLast edit: September 03, 2022, 06:42:11 PM by OneNutS
content: .RESSOURCES.         .SOCIALS.                   INTDESTCOIN is an ecosystem that validates value for anything, anywhere. It has enabled the validation of any digital content with no geographic location restrictions.INTD : To create an integrated financial ecosystem for INTDEST services that includes but is not limited to short selling and hedging tools , an optimized trading algorithm from global investors , and exchange using the most popular payment tools .  More details on the website:  https://intdestcoin.com/    ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: September 2 - September 29  lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every 3 days !● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the the INTD address on ( https://localtrade.cc )● Join INTDESTCOIN on social media:- YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord● Perform tasks throughout the week! Tasks completed in one day-spam.●  You will receive 0 stakes for writing comments in TELEGRAM, TWITTER  OFFICIAL PAGES! You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. ● Make reports in a separate post every 3 days. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!● Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program.● Bounty Manager credits Spreadsheets with stakes once a week. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: INTDESTCOIN , INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- INTD address on ( https://localtrade.cc)- Registration email on the https://localtrade.cc- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:Bounty campaign reward pool:  1 500 000 INTD will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video:  15%● Medium:  10%● Twitter : 20%● Telegram: 15%● Facebook: 15%● Instagram: 5%● Discord: 10%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules:  ● Join INTDESTCOIN on social media:- YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company INTDESTCOIN● Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!● Content topics:About intd networksAbout XCHAIN   proprietary blockchainAbout dAp and the DEX projectAbout the Metaverse and NFT project, complete information is available on the following websites:https://intdest.iohttps://intdest.pro   Information can be used from social networks INTDESTCOINand  WP and hashtags: #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN ● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1.  Join INTDESTCOIN on social media:- YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord3. Write a good video about INTDESTCOIN  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Original article: 5 - 10 stakes, per participant in the campaign: Once every 3 days - max 2 articles per week ( 8 per campaign )● 1 comment - 1 steak (2 per day at most)(DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT)You can use social media for information: - YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- DiscordRules:● Follow the Medium   ( Don't forget to clap)● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Your account on Medium must be at least 1 month old and original. Fake, dead, inactive and bot accounts are not accepted.                     ● You must be an active and regular Medium user.   ● The account must be open as a public profile.● Create INTD article in your profile. You can use social media for simplicity: - YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord● “Applause” and Bookmark our Medium Press release● Write one comment every day about the project on other famous pages (2 per day at most) (DO NOT SPAM ON OFFICIAL PROJECT PAGES) ● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1.  Join INTDESTCOIN on social media:- YouTube- Medium- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord2.Make reports every 3 days  using this format:Code:● Medium Report ●- Day: XX - XX- Medium Profile:- Link to the article (if there is one)- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:- Comment Link #6:3. Submit it here: Rewards:● Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Make 1 Tweet every day. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN● Make 1 Retweet every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags:  #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN● Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. ● Participants must use  #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN hashtags in every retweet and tweet.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin Center● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Day: XX - XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #2....- Tweet Link#2....- Retweet Link #3....- Tweet Link#3....Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (10 stakes/week)● 10 stakes once for wearing a "Your Name | INTDESTCOIN” + LOGO.Rules:● Join  - Telegram● Make a maximum 2 comments per 1 day● Write comments in different groups! Writing in the same groups - SPAM!● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the INTDESTCOINWrite comments on groups from this  listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. Comment examples:- Did you hear about the INTDESTCOIN?- Is the INTDESTCOIN good for buying now??- Is the INTDESTCOIN powered by BSC or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the INTDESTCOIN?- INTDESTCOIN looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | INTDESTCOIN Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days  using this format::Code:[code] ● Telegram Report ●- Day XX - XX- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:.- Comment Link #6:Rewards:● 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Facebook account ● Make 1 posts and 1 repost per day.● Like a post when you make a share.● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag:  #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Facebook Report ●Day: XX-XXFacebook Profile Link:- Share Link #1:- Custom Post Link #1:- Share Link #2:- Custom Post Link #2:- Share Link #3:- Custom Post Link #3:Rewards:●  300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post●  1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post●  5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post●  10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Instagram account ●  Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram   per Day.●  Like all posts on the official page.●  Post must contain  hashtag:  #INTD #XCHAIN   #INTDESTCOIN● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Instagram Report ●- Day:XX-XX- Instagram Profile link:- Custom Post Link #1:- Custom Post Link #2:- Custom Post Link #3:                            Rewards:● 10 stakes/week● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per dayRules:●  Must follow project Discord account● Write at least 10 constructive messages in this list: https://disboard.org/servers/tag/nft Posts/messages must be constructive and in a way that will not be considered spamming.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● DO NOT use hashtags !!! For using hashtags - 0 stakes!● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per day● Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought.● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  INTDESTCOIN Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make weekly report in this thread using this format:Code:● Discord Report ●- Week:- Discord Profile link:- Discord comments:1: Link to Screenshot of Comment 2: Link to Screenshot of Comment 3: Link to Screenshot of Comment...etc.[/code]
